segments.text: Would you please recommend some Chinese wine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to have a taste of Moutan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great ! What comes along with Moutan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you con order some typical Chinese dishes . For example , Roast Beijing Duck .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is the best of our hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Let me have a try .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Just a moment , please .
segments.speaker: S2
